title: REPLACE_FIRST
description: Returns a new string in which only the first occurrence matching the provided regular expression (regex) within the original string is replaced by the specified replacement substring.

parameters.name: regex
parameters.description: The regular expression defining the pattern to replace.

parameters.name: replacement
parameters.description: The substring used to replace the first matched pattern.

examples:
REPLACE_FIRST("Coupon coupon Coupon", "Coupon", "Discount")
-- Returns: "Discount coupon Coupon"
-- Only the first occurrence of "Coupon" is replaced with "Discount"ï¼ˆcase-sensitive).
